short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verisight is a browser extension that helps you to verify the authenticity of the news you read on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verisight is a fact-checking tool that aims to combat the spread of misinformation online. It provides readers with useful insights about the credibility of news articles and their underlying messages. Some of the key features of Verisight include:

Headline to body incongruence detection: It analyzes whether the headlines of articles accurately reflect the contents of the full text. Significant incongruences can be a sign of potentially misleading reporting.

AI cross-checking: The system automatically cross-references article contents with multiple reliable fact-checking sources and databases to check for factual accuracy. This helps identify false or unsubstantiated claims.

AI summarization: Readers are presented with an AI-generated high-level summary that condenses the main topics and conclusions of the article without having to read the full text. This helps avoid accidental spreading of misinformation.

User notes: Additional context and notes can be included by users to explain complex topics, provide source references, and point out any potential biases. This helps readers make more informed judgments about the credibility and intended messages of news articles.
